body.name: Yoobure Side Table with Storage, LED Night Stand with Charging Station, End Tables Living Room, Nightstand for Bedroom with Adjustable Fabric Drawer, 3-Tier Wood Bedside Table, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 34 mins
features: 🔥Always by Your Side. Overall Nightstand Dimensions: 15.4"L x 11.8"W x 23.6"H🔥

🤩【Upgraded Adjustable Drawer】The nightstand have an adjustable fabric drawer and storage shelves. You can position the drawer in the middle or bottom tiers based on your preferences (just plan ahead for the installation). The small nightstand also blends the advantages of private and open storage/display to suit your needs.

💡【Attractive LED Nightstands】Yoobure wood nightstand features vibrant lighting with 22 dynamic modes, 7 static modes, music sync, and a timing function. It adds style to your room decor and doubles as a night light to ease your fear of darkness. Get a pair for both sides - it's even better.

👍【Sturdy & Stable】The night stand with charging station is made from premium wood board and a sturdy steel frame. We've also reinforced this bedside table with an X-shaped rod in the back to ensure stability and durability. Additionally, the adjustable foot pads provide an extra layer of stability.

🔋【Charging is a Snap!】Low battery? No problem! Our black nightstand has 2 outlets and USB ports, making it a breeze to charge your phone, iPad, and other devices. Plus these well-positioned outlets avoid interfering with each other during multi-device charging at once.

🏘【Versatile Night Stands】The black steel frame and rustic top create a stylish mix on this tall nightstand, resulting in a modern yet warm addition to your room. It can be used as a bed side table for bedroom, a storage end table for living room, a side table with drawer for cloakroom, etc., and fits into any corner without taking up much space.

🛠【Effortless Assembly】We provide a clear assembly manual, all needed tools and labeled parts to make setup easy! And you can find an assembly video on the product page for extra guidance. Plus, enjoy peace of mind with our 1-YEAR WARRANTY of the bed side table/night stand, and our team responds within 12 hours!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Spacious Storage Drawers Non-Wowen Fabric Drawer Provides Convenient and Spacious Storage Space with Comfortable Handles. Increase the Sturdiness X-shape support ensures the entire nightstand's stability and durability. Adjustable Feet Pad Suited for your any floor and blanket, adding support and balance.
Previous page Next page 1 HOME OFFICE 2 LIVING ROOM 3 BEDROOM 4 ENTRYWAY

What are the dimensions of this wooden nightstand? The overall dimensions are 15.4"L x 11.8"W x 23.6"H. The drawer dimensions are 13.4"L x 10.8"W x 5.9"H. The heights of the 2 open shelves are 6.2" and 6.8" respectively. You can also check the size picture on the page for detailed info. It is difficult to assemble this side table with charging station? Assembling this bedroom nightstand is very easy. We provide all necessary tools and a detailed instruction manual. All components and parts are numbered to ensure easy assembly. Plus, you can refer to the installation video on the product page. What does "adjustable drawer" mean? This means that you have 2 different options for installing the drawer (when assembling, the install position should be determined). You can choose to install it either in the middle layer or the bottom layer of the night table, based on your needs. What functions can the LED strip achieve? Our LED strip offers a wide range of features including 22 dynamic modes, music sync, and timing function. Additionally, you can control it in 3 ways (the mobile app, a switch, or a remote control), with a maximum control distance of up to 32.8ft. Is there any noise when using this socket? These bed side tables will not generate noise during use. Yoobure small bedside tables are certified by FCC and ETL for compliance, and each product undergoes strict quality inspections to ensure its performance and reliability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit for tight space.
reviews.reviewText: Its a perfect cute little night stand and has a rustic look. Love the led lights which can be used as a night light. USB and power outlet are a plus. Sturdy and easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up beautiful night stand
reviews.reviewText: This was an easy set up thank God! Everything was explained in great detail in the directions which helped with time and energy. The LED light adds such a unique and beautiful effect to the nightstand. It’s small but it holds a lot in the drawer and it has a bottom and middle shelf. Honestly it was a great buy and it was super sturdy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect end table
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect little side/end table. Wanted an inexpensive table to put the PS5 console on. It has great storage to store the games and a shelves to put other things on. It went together easily and is very sturdy. It looks great next to our TV!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: It was pretty easy to assemble and is pretty good quality for the price. Cute and simple. The led lights are a nice touch. Great little addition to my room and helpful with organizing chargers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Light strip doesn’t stick
reviews.reviewText: Overall a pretty well made table for the price. I thought the lights came as part of the table like it was made into it, but it’s just a small little strip light. I cleaned the surface and stuck it on there, but within a day, it had already fallen off. You can buy extra strip lights for dirt cheap off amazon. Thats my only complaint. The table itself works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a purchase that made me love Amazon all over again as I was honestly surprised at this nightstand. Solid made and easy to put together, this table was perfect for my guest room and I'm going to purchase another for the other side of the bed. Simple, yet modern the picture does this justice. You get exact what you see. And the led lights was a nice touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly, sturdy, & great for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this nightstand in dire need of something to hold my remotes and cups. There is so much room in it for the size. There’s 3 shelf levels and a roomy drawer. It was extremely easy to assemble and came with all the needed tools. Free allen wrench & phillips-head. Great buy, however, the LED strip is not worth it and wasn’t really something I was anticipating to use regardless. The adhesive isn’t nearly strong enough to hold it very long. Mine has already fallen off after about 2 weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this night stand. Easy to put together and looks great. The outlets on the top are a real space saver. Excellent !
